amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Economic Support Fund and the allocation within that amount for grants for Turkey by $207 million and apply that funding to establish National Guard Weapons of Mass Destruction Civil Support Teams.
amendment.purpose: An amendment that would reduce economic support funds for Turkey by $207,000,000 and this amount shall be available to establish National Guard Weapons of Mass Destruction Civil Support Team as authorized by law.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 113 - 312 (Roll no. 107).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. DeFazio.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 113 - 312 (Roll no. 107).
